summary: Replaces the restoration buff from the Bond of Matrimony with a 50 point carrying capacity increase, gives it the diamond ring mesh, and raises its sell price. For those of us who wish we had more of a reason to wear our wedding rings.
descriptionHtml:
A simple respec of the Bond of Matrimony. Non-casters don\'t get much benefit out of the vanilla wedding ring, so I decided to replace the enchantment with something more universally applicable: an increase in the player\'s carrying capacity.

The latest version gives you three different enchantment strengths to choose from (+25, +35, or +50 lbs. of extra weight), allowing you to tailor the ring\'s powers to your expectations. 

I\'ve also replaced the default gold mesh with the diamond ring .nif, and raised its value significantly.
author: JanusForbeare
